Summary Experience includes complex investments, financing and risk management strategies of a large multinational corporation, Balance Sheet and Cash Flow hedging, debt issuance, fair valuation, accounting control structure organization and auditing, SEC / GAAP guidance interpretation and financial statement reporting, cash flow forecasting of a $20 billion organizational unit, accounting and operational policy setting and compliance, project and people management, and training professionals on highly complex topics. Summary I am a finance professional with 4+ years of experience in finance and accounting fields. I have education background in finance, accounting, and computer science. I am an expert in financial analysis, investment valuation, as well as budgeting and planning. My key skill sets include statistical analysis, problem solving, process improvement, business partnership, as well as strategic thinking. Experience Sr. Financial Analyst Oracle November 2014  – Present (10 months) San Francisco Bay Area Sr. Lead Financial Analyst- Cloud Computing Intel Corporation February 2014  –  October 2014  (9 months) ○Led two financial analysts to prepare close summary package and present results to finance V.P. 
 
○ Managed budgets for 10+ divisions with $250M+ annual spending. Analyzed patterns and offered guidance to division VPs for spending management. Provided VPs with cost saving recommendations 
 
○ Partnered with division VPs to formulate spending and headcount needs for future periods. Assisted in prioritizing projects and allocated resources based on prioritization Treasury Intel Capital (Strategic Investment) Analyst Intel Corporation August 2012  –  February 2014  (1 year 7 months) o Assessed fair valuation for private investments and worked with investment managers to resolve valuation differences. This requires an in-depth understanding of investment valuation and allocation methodologies	 
 
o Evaluated Marked-to-Market gain and losses for investments and derivatives (50+ companies with $100M+/quarter) and reviewed classification for appropriateness  
 
o Performed monthly reconciliations for all strategic investment related accounts ($5B+) and worked with business partners to address material differences.  
 
o Assisted management in decision making by using statistical and scenario analysis in various projects Risks and Controls Analyst Intel September 2010  –  August 2012  (2 years) o Managed financial information system and partnered with IT and global site representatives to address questions and issues. Created knowledge base to serve as user job aid and reduced questions and issues by 60%-70%, driving time savings for both business partners and management 
 
o Delivered periodic process reviews to senior management and stakeholders. Aligned people on system performance and environmental changes, and proposed meaningful recommendations to drive system efficiency and enhancement 
 
o Recognized patterns when reviewing access for cross application conflicts. Created mapping based on patterns and automated reviewing processes, resulting in 100+ hour annual savings 
 
o Audited reconciliations on a monthly basis and facilitated SOX reliance on reconciliations. Provided meaningful recommendation to improve efficiency and effectives of reconciliations Sr. Financial Analyst Oracle November 2014  – Present (10 months) San Francisco Bay Area Sr. Financial Analyst Oracle November 2014  – Present (10 months) San Francisco Bay Area Sr. Lead Financial Analyst- Cloud Computing Intel Corporation February 2014  –  October 2014  (9 months) ○Led two financial analysts to prepare close summary package and present results to finance V.P.
